content: 2 5 cm 1 inch from the cast on edge repeat rounds 1-4 9 more times or until your leg is of desired length work round 1 one more time heel heel short row 5 rs knit until the wrapped stitch from the previous row knit the wrapped stitch heel short row 1 rs k1 p 1 k2tog yo k 2 p 1 together with its wrap w&t the next wrapped k 1 three times k1 p 1 k2tog yo k 2 p 1 w&t stitch now has two wraps around it heel short row 2 ws k1 p 4 k1 p2 three times heel short row 6 ws s 1 purlwise purl until the k 1 p 4 k 1 w&t next wrapped stitch ssp the wrapped stitch with its wrap w&t the next wrapped stitch now has heel short row 3 rs work as established until 1 two wraps around it st rems before the wrapped stitch from the previous row w&t heel short row 7 rs s 1 purlwise knit until the next wrapped stitch knit the wrapped stitch heel short row 4 ws work as established until 1 together with its two wraps w&t st rems before the wrapped stitch from the previous row w&t heel short row 8 ws s 1 purlwise purl until the next wrapped stitch ssp the wrapped stitch with repeat row 3-4 eight more times 12 sts between its two wraps w&t wraps 10 wraps on both side of the heel ©sari nordlund remaining one on both side of the heel together with its two wraps k 31 sts k1 p 1 k 4 p 1 k 1 repeat until end of the round heel short row 9 rs s 1 purlwise knit until the next wrapped stitch knit the wrapped stitch foot together with its two wraps do not turn you are round 1 k 32 sts k1 p 1 k 2 yo ssk p 1 k 1 repeat now continuing in the round again pick up one until end of the round stitch between the last wrapped stitch and the first stitch of the instep and knit it together with round 2 k 32 sts k1 p 1 k 4 p 1 k 1 repeat until the next stitch p 1 k2tog yo k 2 p 1 k 1 three end of the round times p 1 k2tog yo k 2 p 1 slip the last st of the round on your right needle pick up one stitch round 3 k 32 sts k1 p 1 k2tog yo k 2 p 1 k 1 between the last stitch of the instep and the first repeat until end of the round stitch of the sole slip the slipped stitch back from round
